item.title: Four Opinion Writers on ‘Wicked’: ‘Women Deserve Rage. We Have a Lot to Be Angry About.’
item.description: A big-budget holiday film with a strong antifascist message? “Wicked” is not what we expected.

item.title: FIFA Should Compensate Migrant Workers Injured Building Qatar World Cup, Report Says
item.description: An unpublished report into the soccer governing body’s responsibility for migrant workers recommends that it should compensate those harmed.

item.title: Rebels in Syria Reach Outskirts of Aleppo, in Biggest Advance in Years, Monitor Says

item.title: Russia, Targeting Ukraine’s Grid, Moves to Cut Off Its Nuclear Plants
item.description: Moscow has increasingly hit critical substations linked to nuclear power plants in an effort to disconnect them. The assaults risk a disaster, experts...
